>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

Your nanites can fuse your melee weapons with your armor and shape them to best complement your fighting style. When you use your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.LLNp1urkLncOxgsb]{Gear Array (Ex)} to form a melee weapon, the weapon gains the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.Item.GmvuMSuK17HzJMgt]{Integrated Weapons (Ex)} special property. You can equip the weapon into an empty armor upgrade slot instead of wielding it. Additionally, you can give the weapon either the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#disarm]{Disarm} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.Nrf6oy9pJwcEmryP.JournalEntryPage.nXkFsyxk7Vybdn7G#reach]{Reach} special weapon properties.
